```{r pancreas 32304665, include=FALSE}

PMID_32304665 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32304665', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32304665 <- paste0(PMID_32304665$journal,' ', PMID_32304665$year, ' ', PMID_32304665$month,';', PMID_32304665$volume,'(', PMID_32304665$number,'):', PMID_32304665$pages)

PubMed_32304665 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32304665$eprint)

doi_32304665 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32304665$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
